title: Bug 114905 - The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description:
Description: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Provide step 1 here]
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB:
Change the Display type to Combo Box.
Expected result: "aaa" should be the default value.
After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
